alert.note: Alert for Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:52AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lynn County through 1030 AM CDT... At 952 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near O`Donnell, or 14 miles southwest of Tahoka, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tahoka and O`Donnell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
